short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Better layout for Poe.com and allow for resizable dialog area

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poe.com Resizer is a Chrome extension that enables interactive resizing of the chat area on Poe.com. It also provide options on extension popup for hiding the scrollbars base on user preference on latest version of Chrome.
